document.full_text: a day after army engineers opened a key spillway to relieve flooding along the mississippi river, residents of small louisiana towns braced on sunday for a surge of water that could leave thousands of homes and farms under as much as 20 feet of water.
document.title: louisiana bayou towns brace for flooding impact
lines_and_colors: a day after army engineers opened a key spillway to relieve flooding along the mississippi river, residents of small louisiana towns braced on sunday for a surge of water that could leave thousands of homes and farms under as much as 20 feet of water.
